+#textdomain wesnoth-Invasion_from_the_Unknown
+
+[scenario]
+    id=03_Memories_from_the_Depths
+    name= _ "Memories from the Depths"
+    {MAP 03_Memories_from_the_Depths.map}
+    {TURNS 62 61 60}
+    victory_when_enemies_defeated=no    # to handle side 2 leader's death manually
+    next_scenario=04_Over_the_Sands
+
+    {UNDERGROUND}
+
+    {SCENARIO_MUSIC "underground.ogg"}
+    {DEATHS_COMMON}
+
+    {STORYTXT_HORRORS_FROM_THE_DEPTHS}
+    {STORYMAP_HORRORS_FROM_THE_DEPTHS}
+
+    [side]
+        type=Elvish Hero
+        description=Galas
+        user_description= _ "Galas"
+        unrenamable=yes
+        side=1
+        canrecruit=yes
+        controller=human
+        team_name=heroes
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Elves"
+        shroud=yes
+        income=2
+        {GOLD 250 200 150}
+    [/side]
+
+    [side]
+        type=Ancient Lich
+        description=Mal Keshar
+        user_description= _ "Mal Keshar"
+        unrenamable=yes
+        side=2
+        canrecruit=yes
+        profile=portraits/mal-keshar.jpg
+        team_name=baddies
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Enemies"
+        [modifications]
+            {TRAIT_UNDEAD}
+        [/modifications]
+        {QUANTITY recruit
+        ("Walking Corpse,Vampire Bat,Ghost,Skeleton Archer,Skeleton,Skeleton Rider")
+        ("Soulless,Vampire Bat,Ghost,Skeleton Archer,Skeleton,Skeleton Rider,Ghoul")
+        ("Soulless,Blood Bat,Wraith,Ghost,Skeleton Archer,Skeleton,Skeleton Rider,Ghoul")
+        }
+        {GOLD 100 125 150}
+        income=-3
+        [ai]
+            [avoid]
+                x,y=24,39
+            [/avoid]
+            village_value=0.02
+            protect_leader=4
+        [/ai]
+    [/side]
+
+    [side]
+        # Cave pests
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=3
+        team_name=baddies
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+    [/side]
+
+    [event]
+        name=prestart
+        # Keep Malin's backup in memory, just for debugging purposes
+        # i.e., so that trigerring victory via :n works right.
+        [store_unit]
+            variable=malin_probe
+            kill=no
+            [filter]
+                description="Mal Keshar"
+            [/filter]
+        [/store_unit]
+

+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}

+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}

+        {ANONYMOUS_GUARD {DIFF (Skeleton Archer) (Bone Shooter) (Banebow)} 2 35 9}
+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}
+        {ANONYMOUS_GUARD (Necrophage) 2 24 9}
+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}
+        {ANONYMOUS_GUARD (Banebow) 2 29 7}
+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}

+        {ANONYMOUS_MAKE_UNDEAD}
+        {ANONYMOUS_GUARD (Soulless) 2 29 8}

+        {ANONYMOUS_GUARD {DIFF (Vampire Bat) (Vampire Bat) (Blood Bat)} 3 2 23}
+
+        # Sad music
+        [music]
+            name=main_menu.ogg
+        [/music]

+        # wmllint: recognize Anlindë
+        [role]
+            role=Supporter
+            side=1
+            [not]
+                description=Anlindë
+            [/not]

+            role=Supporter

+            side=1
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_WIN ( _ "Explore the caves")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Galas")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Anlindë")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Turns run out")}
+        [/objectives]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=start
+        {MSG_NARRATOR ( _ "After the remaining survivors entered the cave, and Galas and Anlindë went in, she collapsed the cave entrance with a spell. Her hope was that this would buy them time to find a northward exit.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "We lost our home... many of our children and elders... and our lord, at the hands of those fiends... what will we do now? Where will we go?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Don't despair, Galas. This is not the first time we have lost our home, and we always have found a new one. I think it will be no different this time.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "I profoundly hope so. We must continue down these caves, then. But Anlindë, you mentioned something about an evil force before counselling flight.  What did you mean?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "I meant there was some great evil aiding the humans. Not merely ordinary necromancers and war-beasts, but something worse. Something I believed we had already vanquished... but now I realize we had not not, at least not completely...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "I still don't understand. Of what foe do you speak?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Nothing you should know, impudent boy! Do not ask of it again; some truths should go unrevealed save in dire necessity, and this is no such an occasion. Now I suggest we find an exit before they discover how to reopen the cave entrance. There is no looking back - our valley is probably in ruins by now. It saddens me, but we must live with it.")}
+        [music]
+            name=underground.ogg
+            immediate=yes
+        [/music]
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "I suppose so... Let us find an exit. If we but can...this cave system has never been explored before.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Would that we had more experience at moving in this darkness. This will be a long exploration.")}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=sighted
+        [filter]
+            side=2
+        [/filter]
+        [filter_second]
+            side=1
+        [/filter_second]
+        {REDRAW}
+        [message]
+            speaker=second_unit
+            message= _ "Undead! There are undead here!"
+        [/message]
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "We were not aware of undead roaming these caves!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "We shall have to deal with them before finding the exit.")}
+        {SCROLL_TO $x2 $y2}
+        [objectives]
+            side=1
+            summary= _ "New objectives:"
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_WIN ( _ "Find the undead enemy leader")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Galas")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Anlindë")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Turns run out")}
+        [/objectives]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=sighted
+        [filter]
+            description=Mal Keshar
+        [/filter]
+        [filter_second]
+            side=1
+        [/filter_second]
+        {REDRAW}
+
+        [message]
+            speaker=second_unit
+            message= _ "Who is this foul enemy that seeks our death?"
+        [/message]
+
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I am Mal Keshar, and I will avenge myself upon you all!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Keshar? That name...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Your kind has tried numerous times to vanquish me, but you cannot. I am more powerful than you or those foul orcs! Now, prepare to die.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Anlindë?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "I could swear I read his name in old scrolls about the Golden Age, but I'm not sure.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "If that is true, then we are facing a foe that may be indestructible. Is there any other option?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "We cannot go back, there is no way of escape except this one. We must defeat him before he destroys us!")}
+        {SCROLL_TO $x2 $y2}
+        [objectives]
+            side=1
+            summary= _ "New objectives:"
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_WIN ( _ "Defeat Mal Keshar")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Galas")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Anlindë")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Turns run out")}
+        [/objectives]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=attack_end
+        first_time_only=no
+        [filter]
+            description="Mal Keshar"
+        [/filter]
+        [filter_second]
+            side=1
+        [/filter_second]
+
+        [if]
+            [variable]
+                name=unit.hitpoints
+                less_than_equal_to=0
+            [/variable]
+            [then]
+                [store_unit]
+                    variable=malin_probe
+                    kill=no
+                    [filter]
+                        description="Mal Keshar"
+                    [/filter]
+                [/store_unit]
+                {ENDLEVEL_VICTORY yes}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=attack_end
+        first_time_only=no
+        [filter]
+            side=1
+        [/filter]
+        [filter_second]
+            description="Mal Keshar"
+        [/filter_second]
+
+        [if]
+            [variable]
+                name=second_unit.hitpoints
+                less_than_equal_to=0
+            [/variable]
+            [then]
+                [store_unit]
+                    variable=malin_probe
+                    kill=no
+                    [filter]
+                        description="Mal Keshar"
+                    [/filter]
+                [/store_unit]
+                {ENDLEVEL_VICTORY yes}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=victory
+        {VARIABLE malin_probe.hitpoints malin_probe.max_hitpoints}
+        [unstore_unit]
+            variable=malin_probe
+            find_vacant=no
+            animate=no
+        [/unstore_unit]
+        [object]
+            silent=yes
+            [filter]
+                description=Mal Keshar
+            [/filter]
+            [effect]
+                apply_to=hitpoints
+                heal_full=yes
+            [/effect]
+        [/object]
+        [music]
+            immediate=yes
+            name=elvish-theme.ogg
+        [/music]
+        {REDRAW}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I cannot believe it. I have been defeated. My long battle against the orcs is lost! But, I still stand...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "So it is you, Mal Keshar, formerly known as Malin Keshar. The one who fell to the darkness for fighting in a noble cause with tainted means. You have been used as a warning to our children for centuries, and are the unliving proof that the glories of the Golden Age are dead.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Ignorant elf! I am no mere shambling revenant, but a lich of power. I still think, feel, and am aware of the current situation of Wesnoth.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Wesnoth? What is that?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Long ago, it was the name of the land south of the Swamps of Dread, and west from the Silver Lands.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Aye, and my thirst for orcish death will never be satisfied. For I can no longer go to the surface now that the land is under the control of the forces of Evil.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "What?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Your kind always punished necromancers for disturbing the dead. You thought us the foulest evil imaginable, but you were wrong. I have seen and learned of things that even I consider abominations. For all these centuries, after the Fall, I have been hiding here, but I send minions to the outer world from time to time, to collect news from there.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Some centuries ago, a malign shadow issuing from the vast Ocean covered the lands, and an evil presence began to swallow every living creature. After some time, monstrosities from the underworld began raiding and destroying what human, elvish and orcish encampments were left in the desert. These monsters were called, in my time, demons. I suppose you remember them, do you?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "We do, but it is not possible! The demon lord was vanquished by Eloh a long time ago!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "What are you talking about?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "But that was a mere foretaste of our doom. Something or someone opened a portal to the very heart of Hell, unleashing the forces of Evil and allowing them to cross the void-barriers into our world. I suspect the Wesnothian magi, in their arrogance and pride, of wreaking a greater evil than I ever did. Whoever the culprits were, they cast us into this chaotic future, reshaping the landscape and raising up the two burning suns.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "So that is what attacked us in our valley...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "We need to escape from these caves - but supposing we can, we'll but need to face the evil that roams above us. What could we do?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "You would be killed, tortured or converted by them in matter of hours, perhaps minutes, even seconds. You are few to their many; nor do you have the powers necessary to fight against the demons.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "But you do, don't you?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I am unsure. Centuries have passed since I fought - but I do not fear an end to my un-death. I have nothing left; all that I once loved has been scoured away by pitiless time.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "We'll find a new and safe home, save we vanquish those fiends.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "I agree. But our kin tried before, we have become the witnesses to their failure. We have no aid or craft that they did not. It was a miracle for them that Eloh appeared on the earth to vanquish the evil. That won't happen again.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Can it be that the Elves have forgotten? The force you need is the power of the Union.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "The Union?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Your elder druids and sorceresses know very well that it wasn't the mighty Eloh herself that saved you from that evil; or at least it was not the godlike form that is spoken of in your ancient legends. What won your victory was nothing else than the power of the Union, at hands of the Master of Darkness and the Lady of Light - a human and an elven lady.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Is that true?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Yes, Galas. Although Eloh herself did not vanquish this demon lord, she did send two warriors for that purpose. The proof is that they came from nowhere and went to nowhere.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Actually, they went to a place, a place very deep in the heart of the world. I felt their presences descending into the depths. However, it seems one of them, the Master of Darkness, really disappeared from this world, for I lost track of him. I believe the Lady of Light remains in this world, in that place, just sleeping. If you could awaken her, you would have half the power possibly necessary to defeat whoever is the mastermind of this cruel plot.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "But we don't know how or where she is.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Right, but you could lead us, couldn't you, Mal Keshar?")}
+
+        [role]
+            role=Supporter
+            side=1
+            canrecruit=no
+            [not]
+                description=Anlindë
+            [/not]
+        [/role]
+
+        {MSG_SUF (role=Supporter) ( _ "What?! But lady, he is a lich, a necromancer! We cannot have such an abomination in our side!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Times have changed, and so have our needs and methods. Today I see no other way to survive without help of this necromancer, and he should be the only one left capable of locating our saviors. After all, weren't you fighting for a noble cause, Malin Keshar?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Aye, but I see that my cause was a doomed one, now. I'm not sure it was the right one, as it led me to this undead state. I'd prefer to do some real good before the world ends.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Will you fight for our cause, then?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I shall.")}
+        {MSG_SUF (role=Supporter) ( _ "This is madness!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Keep your mouth shut. This is the decision of a high sorceress, we must respect it.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Thanks for your kindness. You are the first beings with which I have spoken words without blood since I arrived here. I place myself and my powers to your service, elves.")}
+
+        {ALLOW_RECRUIT 1 (Elvish Warrior Spirit,Skeleton,Skeleton Archer,Skeleton Rider,Ghost,Ghoul_C,Vampire Bat,Walking Corpse)}
+        {VARIABLE malin_probe.side 1}
+
+        {MSG_NARRATOR ( _ "You can now recruit undead units!")}
+
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Where must we go?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "We must head West. North-east from the former home of the Wesmere Elves are the mountains where your saviors went to - the caves of Knalga, an ancient, fallen kingdom. It may be that passing through the place where the Wesmere forest used to be will take there faster, but it is currently infested by those damned creatures. I'd rather avoid it while we gather the necessary power to fight against them.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Anlindë ( _ "Then northwest we shall go.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "The exit is not too far from here, going down this subterranean river. Follow me.")}
+
+        [store_unit]
+            variable=malin_probe
+            kill=yes
+            [filter]
+                description=Mal Keshar
+            [/filter]
+        [/store_unit]
+

+#ifdef EASY
+        {MODIFY_UNIT (side=2) side 1}
+#endif
+
+        [unit]
+            description=Mal Keshar
+            user_description=_ "Mal Keshar"
+            type=Ancient Lich
+            side=1
+            {IS_HERO}
+            unrenamable=yes
+            canrecruit=no
+            max_experience=$malin_probe.max_experience
+            experience=$malin_probe.experience
+            # FIXME: these *hitpoints don't have real purpose :/
+            max_hitpoints=$malin_probe.max_hitpoints
+            hitpoints=$malin_probe.hitpoints
+            profile=$malin_probe.profile
+            x,y=$malin_probe.x,$malin_probe.y
+            upkeep=loyal
+            [modifications]
+                {TRAIT_UNDEAD}
+            [/modifications]
+        [/unit]
+
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE malin_probe}
+        {REDRAW}
+    [/event]

     [event]
         name=start
         {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Here you are, the outside. Not too different from the last report of some years ago... or centuries, I don't know.")}
-        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Everything is so... dry... There is no plant that could grow up under this heat!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Everything is so... dry... There is no plant that could thrive in this heat!")}

-        name=prestart
-        # Teleport Galas if appropiate

-                    [filter]

-

-            {VARIABLE_NUM_EQUALS vtable_init_flag 1}

-                # Completed missions
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.silent_forest)                (no)}
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.highlands)                    (no)}

-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.tallin_pass)                  (no)}
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.the_steppes)                  (no)}
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.the_fields)                   (no)}
-
-                # Mission status
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.current)                    (none)}
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.last)                       (none)}
-
-                {ALLOW_RECRUIT 1 ("Aragwaith Archer,Aragwaith Warlock,Aragwaith Swordsman,Aragwaith Spearman,Aragwaith Scout,Aragwaith Eagle Rider")}
-            [/then]
-            [else]
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.last)    ($mission_vtable.current)}
-                {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.current)                    (none)}
-            [/else]
-        [/if]
-        {VARIABLE vtable_init_flag 2}
-
-        [store_side]
-            side=1
-            variable=temp_side
-        [/store_side]
-        {VARIABLE mission_vtable.recruit_list $temp_side.recruit}
-        {VARIABLE mission_vtable.gold $temp_side.gold}
-        {CLEAR_VARIABLE temp_side}
-
-        {REMOVE_RECRUIT_LIST 1}
-

-            side=1
-            gold=0
-            income=-2
-        [/modify_side]

-        {VARIABLE mission_vtable.mission_count 0}
-
-#define __MISSION_COUNT_CHECK _MNAME
-        [if]
-            {VARIABLE_BOOLEAN_EQUALS mission_vtable.{_MNAME} yes}
-            [then]
-                {VARIABLE_INC mission_vtable.mission_count}
-            [/then]
-        [/if]
-#enddef
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK the_fields    }
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK silent_forest)}
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK highlands)    }
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK frozen_plains)}
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK tallin_pass)  }
-        {__MISSION_COUNT_CHECK the_steppes)  }
-    [/event]
-
-#define __ENDLEVEL_LOCAL _SCENARIO
-    [endlevel]
-        next_scenario=15_{_SCENARIO}
-        bonus=no
-        result=continue
-    [/endlevel]
-#enddef

-        name=start

-        [/message]

-            {VARIABLE_NUM_EQUALS mission_vtable.mission_count 0}

-                    description=Galas
-                [/scroll_to_unit]
-#define __MSG_MALIN _MSGTEXT

-#enddef

-#enddef

-                {MSG_FAKE_UNIT erathan_store profile ({_MSGTEXT})}
-#enddef
-#define __MSG_GALAS _MSGTEXT
-                {MSG_UNIT (Galas) ({_MSGTEXT})}
-#enddef
-                {__MSG_MALIN ( _ "No, no, no! And once again, no! I can't accept this.")}
-                {__MSG_ELYNIA ( _ "Malin, you must accept the circumstances and the consequences. If we want to end this once for all, the least we can do is sacrifice our old biases along with our lives... preferably not the latter.")}
-                {__MSG_MALIN ( _ "It is something that really angers me; is it that you do not understand? I thought you knew what led me to this state!")}
-                {__MSG_GALAS ( _ "I understand your anger towards the orcs and their race, but if all that did not happen, we and the rest of our people would be dead by now. There would be noone left to accomplish this task and save the continent. You saved our lives, and you are going to save our destiny, too.")}
-                {__MSG_MALIN ( _ "I'm sorry to deceive you, but I'm not of the bunch that thinks the benefit of many must lay on the misfortune of one.")}
-                {__MSG_GALAS ( _ "Nobody else has treated you as a friend in all this time, you said before. At least that is the good part of your fate. If we can do this together, the historians will no longer write about you as a necromancer, but as a hero. And you will then be free to depart from this world, if you wish to do so.")}
-                {__MSG_ERATHAN ( _ "Pardon me, people, but we have a mission to fulfill; don't delay it with this worthless discussion. We must bring these caravans loaded with tributes to each one of the orcish tribes. If we keep our weapons lowered, their attitude towards us will not be destructive. I speak based on earlier experiences with them. They do not attack defenseless people.")}
-                {__MSG_MALIN ( _ "Now, that is weird.")}
-                {__MSG_GALAS ( _ "Alright, I just hope you know what we are doing, sir.")}
-                {__MSG_ERATHAN ( _ "I know it very well, elf. Otherwise I would not be one of the best patrols of the marchlands.")}
-                {__MSG_MALIN ( _ "(whispering) Galas, are you sure that killing him wasn't a better idea?")}
-            [/then]
-            [else]
-            [/else]
-        [/if]
-    [/event]
-
-#define __MISSION_AREA _VTABLE_ENTRY _SLF _LSID _PRE_SPEECH
-    [event]
-        name=moveto
-        first_time_only=no
-        [filter]
-            {_SLF}
-            side=1
-        [/filter]
-        [if]
-            {VARIABLE_BOOLEAN_NOT_EQUALS (mission_vtable.{_VTABLE_ENTRY}) yes}
-            [then]
-                {_PRE_SPEECH}
-
-                [message]
-                    speaker=unit
-                    message= _ "Should we go this way now?"
-                    [option]
-                        message= _ "Yes, let's go."
-                        [command]
-                            {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.current) ({_VTABLE_ENTRY})}
-
-                            {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.mission_map_spawn.x) $x1}
-                            {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.mission_map_spawn.y) $y1}
-                            {VARIABLE (mission_vtable.mission_map_spawn.flag) yes}
-
-                            {__ENDLEVEL_LOCAL ({_LSID})}
-                        [/command]
-                    [/option]
-                    [option]
-                        message= _ "Not yet."
-                    [/option]
-                [/message]
-            [/then]
-            [else]
-                {RANDOM "elynia_store,malin_store,erathan_store"}
-                {MSG_FAKE_UNIT $random| profile ( _ "Uh... we already went to this place.")}
-                {CLEAR_VARIABLE random}
-            [/else]
-        [/if]
-    [/event]
-#enddef

+#textdomain wesnoth-Invasion_from_the_Unknown
+# It's about the past, and I'm the Shadow Master. Got it? It seemed appropiate...
+[scenario]
+    id=15_Shadows_of_Time
+    name= _ "Shadows of Time"
+    {MAP 15_Shadows_of_Time.map}
+    {TURNS 42 40 38}
+    next_scenario=16_Arrival_of_the_Battalion
+
+    {SCENARIO_MUSIC ("revelation.ogg")}
+
+    {DAWN1}
+    {MORNING1}
+    {MIDDAY1}
+    {AFTERNOON1}
+    {DUSK1}
+    {SHORTDARK}
+    {DAWN2}
+    {MORNING2}
+    {MIDDAY2}
+    {AFTERNOON2}
+    {DUSK2}
+    {LONGDARK1}
+    {LONGDARK2}
+    {LONGDARK3}
+    {LONGDARK4}
+
+    {STORYTXT_SHADOWS_OF_TIME}
+    {STORYMAP_SHADOWS_OF_TIME}
+
+    {DEATHS_COMMON}
+
+    [side]
+        side=1
+        controller=human
+        team_name=good
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Allies"
+
+        type=Elvish Hero
+        description=Galas
+        user_description= _ "Galas"
+        unrenamable=yes
+        canrecruit=yes
+        fog=yes
+        shroud=yes
+        share_maps=yes
+        share_view=yes
+
+        {INCOME 9 6 3}
+    [/side]
+
+    [side]
+        side=2
+        team_name=good
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Allies"
+
+        type=Steppe Khan
+        description=Quogar Ratham
+        user_description= _ "Quogar Ratham"

+        canrecruit=yes
+        profile="portraits/James_Woo/orc-warlord2.png"
+        [modifications]
+            {TRAIT_INTELLIGENT}
+            {TRAIT_STRONG}
+        [/modifications]
+
+        [ai]
+            aggression=1.0
+            caution=0.0
+            protect_leader=10.0
+            leader_value=10.0
+            village_value=0.3
+        [/ai]
+        {GOLD 230 200 170}
+        recruit=Steppe Hunter,Orcish Grunt,Goblin Spearman,Wolf Rider,Steppe Herder,Steppe Warrior,Steppe Spearhead,Orcish Archer,Orcish Assassin
+        fog=yes

+        share_view=yes
+    [/side]

+    [side]
+        side=3

+        {GOLD 180 220 260}

+            aggression=1.0

+            passive_leader=yes
+            recruitment_pattern=scout,scout,fighter,fighter,archer,archer,fighter,archer

+                description=Galas
+                value=10.0
+            [/target]

+                value=9.5
+            [/target]
+        [/ai]
+    [/side]

+    {STARTING_VILLAGES 3 7}
+    {STARTING_VILLAGES 4 7}
+    {STARTING_VILLAGES 5 7}
+
+    [event]
+        name=prestart
+        {PLAYER_RECRUITMENT_SETUP_FOR_SCENARIO 15}
+        {TEAM_COLOR_OVERRIDE (description=Mal Hekuba) purple}
+
+        # Recall heroes
+        # wmllint: recognize Elynia
+        {RECALL Elynia}
+        # wmllint: recognize Mal Keshar
+        {RECALL (Mal Keshar)}
+        # wmllint: recognize Erathan
+        {RECALL Erathan}
+        # wmllint: recognize Igor
+        {RECALL Igor}
+
+        [objectives]
+            side=1
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_WIN ( _ "Defeat all enemy leaders")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Defeat of orcish allies")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Galas")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Elynia")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Mal Keshar")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Erathan")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Turns run out")}
+        [/objectives]
+
+        [store_unit]
+            [filter]
+                description=Mal Hekuba
+            [/filter]
+            variable=malhekuba_store
+            kill=no
+        [/store_unit]
+
+        {VARIABLE hekuba_escape_hp $malhekuba_store.hitpoints}
+        {VARIABLE_MUL hekuba_escape_hp (0.50)}
+
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE malhekuba_store}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=start
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Your deal is pretty convincing... for other orcs, not us. We are not slackers who will 'help' inferior creatures for gold and territory; if we want them, we shall get them fighting, not dealing stupid contracts.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "'Inferior' creatures, you say?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I knew we would not get much else from your kind, sickening orc. At least not using words and diplomacy!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Ha, and what would you do then? Kill us? What benefit would that bring you?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "It would quench my thirst, of course...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Quit your folly! These are not times for resuming our ancient conflicts; we must concentrate on the real enemy that threatens all life in the continent, including you, orcs.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "I would not ever buy those tales spoken by you, fairy. It is obvious that you are trying to trick us to get cheap war-beasts for your inane purposes.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "Those inane purposes shall be yours too, early or later. If you don't want to accept the deal we'll not further insist, but you shall receive no help from us when you and your people get to face the truth.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "It little matters anyway; you won't survive to see that day...")}
+
+        {CHANGE_MUSIC    "../sounds/ambient/wardrums.ogg"}
+
+        {REDRAW}
+        {DELAY 750}
+
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Wardrums? I have not given the order YET!")}
+
+        [modify_side]
+            side=1
+            fog,shroud=no,no
+        [/modify_side]
+        [modify_side]
+            side=2
+            fog,shroud=no,no
+        [/modify_side]
+
+        {MSG_UNIT (Tan Zalfargat) ( _ "Hold there, 'friend'! Time has come for you to bite the dust in your grave!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "What the heck are you doing in _my_ territory? I have banished you many times already, hasn't it been enough for you?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Tan Zalfargat) ( _ "Heh, see who speaks, the one who deals with human worms and those weaklings of the forests. Sorry, but this time I have brought the support of my new friends...")}
+        {SCROLL_TO_UNIT Tanstafaal}
+        {DELAY 500}
+        {SCROLL_TO_UNIT (Mal Hekuba)}
+        {DELAY 500}
+
+        {CHANGE_MUSIC    "battle.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC        "battle.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "loyalists.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "nunc_dimittis.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "legends_of_the_north.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "revelation.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "the_king_is_dead.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "main_menu_new.ogg"}
+
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Ah, so you deal with those stinkin' necromancers too? That makes very little, if any difference.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "I see that the Emperor was right on his suspects. The elves have escaped from their doom once again.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "Very well, heathens. This is the last time your kind escapes the power of the Dark Lady; I won't allow you to get me humillated once again for failing the Iron Council's might and will.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "What is that dirty necromancer ranting about?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Dark Lady? Iron Council? Funny, those names sound surprisingly familiar to me... Beware, for this is one of the foulest priests to Yechnagoth!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Yechnagoth? But... she was vanquished...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "Those are truly lies made up by heretics like you, elf. Her power is still alive, and greatest than ever! Tanstafaal! Give them a taste of her power!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Tanstafaal ( _ "As you command, my master. By Eloh I shall make you suffer for your puny betrayal!")}
+        [store_starting_location]
+            variable=temp_ssl
+            side=3
+        [/store_starting_location]
+        [unit]
+            x=$temp_ssl.x
+            y=$temp_ssl.y
+            animate=yes
+            description="Zel'ruel"
+            user_description= _ "Zel'ruel"
+            type=Elvish Ancestor
+            side=3
+            [modifications]
+                {TRAIT_LOYAL}
+                {TRAIT_UNDEAD}
+                {TRAIT_FEARLESS}
+            [/modifications]
+        [/unit]
+        [unit]
+            x=$temp_ssl.x
+            y=$temp_ssl.y
+            animate=yes
+            description="Galnea"
+            user_description= _ "Galnea"
+            type=Elvish Ancestor
+            gender=female
+            side=3
+            [modifications]
+                {TRAIT_LOYAL}
+                {TRAIT_UNDEAD}
+                {TRAIT_FEARLESS}
+            [/modifications]
+        [/unit]
+        [unit]
+            x=$temp_ssl.x
+            y=$temp_ssl.y
+            animate=yes
+            description="Prodel'na"
+            user_description= _ "Prodel'na"
+#ifdef EASY
+            type=Elvish Warrior Spirit
+#else
+            type=Elvish Ancestor
+#endif
+            side=3
+            [modifications]
+                {TRAIT_LOYAL}
+                {TRAIT_UNDEAD}
+                {TRAIT_FEARLESS}
+            [/modifications]
+        [/unit]
+
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Curse Uria... those are elvish warriors! What is this new enemy we are facing?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I think Althurin mentioned a betrayal by a fraction of the Quenoth elves, who were controlled by Yechnagoth; no one else but Tanuil's people would worship Eloh otherwise. I fear that we have no option but fight against our own people.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "I don't like the sole idea of this. Orc, you'd better flee from this battle; it is not yours to fight!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Bah, I'm not running away like a puny elf just because of a undead horde. I shall fight by your side. Odds are that you would perish without our 'help'.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Stu...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Malin, for the sake of our survival, put your personal conflict with the orcs aside for a while!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Hmph.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "To arms!")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "By the power granted to me, I call upon the might of the Dark Lady! May these plains be devoided of joy and peace! May them be replaced by darkness and decay!")}
+
+        # Set Fog-of-War on and place zombies randomly all over the place
+
+        [modify_side]
+            side=1
+            fog,shroud=yes,yes
+        [/modify_side]
+        [modify_side]
+            side=2
+            fog,shroud=yes,yes
+        [/modify_side]
+
+        [store_starting_location]
+            side=1
+            variable=side1_sloc
+        [/store_starting_location]
+        [store_starting_location]
+            side=2
+            variable=side2_sloc
+        [/store_starting_location]
+        [store_starting_location]
+            side=3
+            variable=side3_sloc
+        [/store_starting_location]
+        [store_starting_location]
+            side=4
+            variable=side4_sloc
+        [/store_starting_location]
+        [store_starting_location]
+            side=5
+            variable=side5_sloc
+        [/store_starting_location]
+
+        [store_locations]
+            x=1-42
+            y=1-35
+            # Not around starting locations; should avoid blocking enemy keeps with units
+            # of their same allegiance but that cannot move
+            [not]
+                x=$side1_sloc.x
+                y=$side1_sloc.y
+                radius=6
+            [/not]
+            [not]
+                x=$side2_sloc.x
+                y=$side2_sloc.y
+                radius=6
+            [/not]
+            [not]
+                x=$side3_sloc.x
+                y=$side3_sloc.y
+                radius=4
+            [/not]
+            [not]
+                x=$side4_sloc.x
+                y=$side4_sloc.y
+                radius=4
+            [/not]
+            [not]
+                x=$side5_sloc.x
+                y=$side5_sloc.y
+                radius=4
+            [/not]
+            variable=locs_store
+        [/store_locations]
+
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE side1_sloc}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE side2_sloc}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE side3_sloc}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE side4_sloc}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE side5_sloc}
+
+        {REPEAT ({DIFF (8) (14) (20)}) (
+            {VARIABLE_RANDOM rand_side ("3,5")}
+            {VARIABLE_RANDOM rand_locndx ("0..$locs_store.length")}
+            # EASY: 100% chance of WCs
+            # NORMAL: 75% chance of WCs; 25% chance of Soullesses
+            # HARD: 50% chance of WCs; 50% chance of Soullesses
+            # NOTE: using DIFF macro as manually inserting #ifdef conditionals screws things up with
+            # the macro block we are at (REPEAT)
+            {DIFF ({VARIABLE temp_corpse.type "Walking Corpse"})
+                  ({VARIABLE_RANDOM temp_corpse.type ("Walking Corpse,Walking Corpse,Walking Corpse,Soulless")})
+                  ({VARIABLE_RANDOM temp_corpse.type ("Walking Corpse,Soulless,Soulless,Walking Corpse")})
+            }
+            {VARIABLE_RANDOM temp_corpse.race ("drake,mounted,saurian,wose,bat")}
+#             [debug_message]
+#                 logger=err
+#                 message="creating unit of type $temp_corpse.type at $locs_store[$rand_locndx].x|,$locs_store[$rand_locndx].y for side $rand_side|; variation is $temp_corpse.race"
+#             [/debug_message]
+            [unit]
+                type=$temp_corpse.type
+                x=$locs_store[$rand_locndx].x
+                y=$locs_store[$rand_locndx].y
+                upkeep=free
+                random_traits=yes
+                generate_description=yes
+                ai_special=guardian
+                variation=$temp_corpse.race
+                side=$rand_side
+            [/unit]
+        )}
+
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE locs_store}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE rand_side}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE rand_locndx}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE temp_corpse}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=die
+        [filter]
+            description=Quogar Ratham
+        [/filter]
+        {MSG_SPEAKER unit ( _ "Argh. This was not supposed to be my final day...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "The orcs have lost their leader and now odds are they'll never accept the deal. Our mission has failed!")}
+        {ENDLEVEL_DEFEAT}
+    [/event]
+
+#define __CHECK_ENEMIES
+    {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I wish ridding the world of Yechnagoth's damage was easier. We have at least a whole empire of hers left.")}
+    {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "I don't know much of Yechnagoth, but from what I know I can tell she is just a legend of ancient times. What does she, the Eater of Souls, have to do with this necromancer and his squire?")}
+    {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "She is not just a legend; some time ago she had influenced most of the known lands with her powers, and I'm fairly sure your country was under her control as well.")}
+    {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "Well, I'm not historian, but I remember tales about an era of darkness and strife. Possibly they are related.")}
+    [if]
+        [have_unit]
+            description=Tan Zalfargat
+        [/have_unit]
+        [then]
+            {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Very well, you are finished now. Your undead companions are either reduced to dust, or have escaped away, and we have got you cornered. Any last words?")}
+            {MSG_UNIT (Tan Zalfargat) ( _ "Bah, I still stand on my feet; that is enough to defeat you. This time I'm not being merciful with you or your kin!")}
+            {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "I wanted to say that last part as well...")}
+        [/then]
+    [/if]
+#enddef
+
+#define __HEKUBA_FADE_STEP _ALPHA
+    [store_unit]
+        [filter]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter]
+        variable=mal_hekuba_store
+    [/store_unit]
+    {VARIABLE mal_hekuba_store.alpha ({_ALPHA})}
+    [unstore_unit]
+        variable=mal_hekuba_store
+        find_vacant=no
+    [/unstore_unit]
+    {CLEAR_VARIABLE mal_hekuba_store}
+#enddef
+
+#define __HEKUBA_ESCAPES
+    {FULL_HEAL (description=Mal Hekuba)}
+    # FIXME: is "get lost" a swear-expression, strictly speaking?
+    {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "Ha ha ha, I have got the news I needed for the Master. Get lost, damned heathens!")}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 224}
+    {FADE_STEP -32 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 192}
+    {FADE_STEP -64 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 160}
+    {FADE_STEP -96 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 128}
+    {FADE_STEP -128 25}
+
+    {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I cannot hold against this dense darkness!")}
+
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 96}
+    {FADE_STEP -160 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 64}
+    {FADE_STEP -192 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 32}
+    {FADE_STEP -224 25}
+    {__HEKUBA_FADE_STEP 0}
+    {FADE_STEP -255 5}
+
+    [kill]
+        description=Mal Hekuba
+    [/kill]
+
+    {DELAY 750}
+
+    {FADE_STEP -224 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -192 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -160 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -128 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -96 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -64 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -32 25}
+    {FADE_STEP 0 500}
+
+    {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "He escaped as we could not see anything. Dang!")}
+    {MSG_UNIT (Tan Zalfargat) ( _ "What?! I should have known I couldn't trust a lich. I guess I'll have to finish with this alone.")}
+#enddef
+
+    [event]
+        name=attacker_hits
+        first_time_only=no
+        [filter_second]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter_second]
+        [if]
+            {VARIABLE_NUM_LESS_OR_EQUAL_THAN second_unit.hitpoints $hekuba_escape_hp}
+            [then]
+                {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=defender_hits
+        first_time_only=no
+        [filter]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter]
+        [if]
+            {VARIABLE_NUM_LESS_OR_EQUAL_THAN unit.hitpoints $hekuba_escape_hp}
+            [then]
+                {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=die
+        [filter]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter]
+        {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=die
+        [filter]
+            description=Tanstafaal
+        [/filter]
+
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Rest in peace, Tanstafaal. Even if you betrayed our kinsmen, the price of roaming the world as undead is not one I would condemn anybody to pay.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "It's disturbing to see that the shade of Yechnagoth is still present in our world, inflicting damage and suffering on lesser creatures.")}
+
+        [if]
+            {NOT (
+                [have_unit]
+                    description=Mal Hekuba
+                [/have_unit]
+            )}
+            [then]
+                {__CHECK_ENEMIES}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=victory
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Well, strangers. You have proved yourselves to be both useful and upright. Although you may not trust our race, we ourselves know and appreciate the value of such an ally.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Does this mean that you agree with the deal for the Grand Council?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Quogar Ratham) ( _ "Of course. As long as you honor it as we shall do.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "...")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Why that look, Malin?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Bah, nothing that you care about.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Well, then...")}
+
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE hekuba_escape_hp}
+    [/event]
+#undef __CHECK_ENEMIES
+#undef __HEKUBA_ESCAPES
+[/scenario]

+#define __HEKUBA_ESCAPES
+    {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ( _ "This is not the day in which you shall see us fall, heretics. Nobody can oppose the power of the Iron Triad's fist and survive for much time!")}

+    {DELAY 750}
+
+    {FADE_STEP -224 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -192 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -160 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -128 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -96 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -64 25}
+    {FADE_STEP -32 25}
+    {FADE_STEP 0 500}
+
+    {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Blast it, he did it once again!")}
+    {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I swear that this is the last time he escapes his deserved punishment.")}
+#enddef
+
+    [event]
+        name=attack
+        first_time_only=no
+        [filter_second]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter_second]
+        {VARIABLE_INC hekuba_attack_count}
+
+        {FULL_HEAL (description=Mal Hekuba)}
+        [if]
+            {VARIABLE_NUM_LESS_THAN hekuba_attack_count ({DIFF 6 8 10})}
+            [then]
+                # Find vacant hexes in a radius of 4-6 around Mal Hekuba
+                [store_locations]
+                    [not]
+                        [filter]
+                        [/filter]
+                    [/not]
+                    [not]
+                        terrain=*^Xm
+                    [/not]
+                    [and]
+                        x=$x2
+                        y=$y2
+                        radius=6
+                    [/and]
+#                     [and]
+#                         [not]
+#                             radius=4
+#                         [/not]
+#                     [/and]
+                    variable=mal_hekuba_teleport_locs
+                [/store_locations]
+                [if]
+                    {VARIABLE_NUM_EQUALS mal_hekuba_teleport_locs.length 0}
+                    [then]
+                        {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
+                    [/then]
+                    [else]
+                        {RANDOM ("0..$mal_hekuba_teleport_locs.length")}
+                        [teleport]
+                            [filter]
+                                description=Mal Hekuba
+                            [/filter]
+                            x=$mal_hekuba_teleport_locs[$random].x
+                            y=$mal_hekuba_teleport_locs[$random].y
+                        [/teleport]
+
+                        {VARIABLE tmp $mal_hekuba_taunt_msg.length}
+                        {VARIABLE_DEC tmp}
+
+                        {RANDOM ("0..$tmp")}
+
+                        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Hekuba) ("$mal_hekuba_taunt_msg[$random].value")}
+
+                        {CLEAR_VARIABLE tmp}
+                        {CLEAR_VARIABLE random}
+                    [/else]
+                [/if]
+                {CLEAR_VARIABLE mal_hekuba_teleport_locs}
+            [/then]
+            [else]
+                #{MSG_NARRATOR ( "FOOBAR")}
+                {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
             [/else]
         [/if]
     [/event]
 
-    {DEATHS_COMMON}
+    [event]
+        name=defender_hits
+        first_time_only=no
+        # side 1 hits Mal Hekuba on defense
+        [filter]
+            description=Mal Hekuba
+        [/filter]
+        [filter_second]
+            side=1
+        [/filter_second]
+        {FULL_HEAL (description=Mal Hekuba)}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=victory
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE hekuba_attack_count}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE mal_hekuba_taunt_msg}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=die
+        [filter]
+            description=boss3
+        [/filter]
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "And so passes the biggest imp ever seen...")}
+        [if]
+            [have_unit]
+                description=Mal Hekuba
+            [/have_unit]
+            [then]
+                {__HEKUBA_ESCAPES}
+            [/then]
+        [/if]
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Let's not further delay our journey now. It's time to advance to the south, but beware, for we don't know exactly what we'll face in the Chaos domain.")}
+        {MSG_INNER ( _ "Yes, you come to my domain of darkness; wherever darkness is, I shall be to haunt you. You cannot escape influence, Galas, I warn you.")}
+        {ENDLEVEL_VICTORY yes}
+    [/event]
+
+#undef __HEKUBA_FADE_STEP
+#undef __HEKUBA_ESCAPES
 [/scenario]

+        name=start

+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "So this is it. It is quite... desolated, now.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Nothing was left of the former glory of the local elves after that fateful night. Trees, elves and forest creatures... even some human and orcish wanderers were all burned alive, not to leave any corpses to bury in a proper way.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "Well, we didn't come here to cry in memory of victims of old wars. Where should be head to?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I am not sure if it's still there, but there was a secret cave back then, in the south-eastern hills, which served as shortcut to the lands of Wesnoth. If we can find and enter it, it could serve us to remain hidden and unnoticed until finding the capital.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Capital? And where should it be?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I suspect that the Empire of Chaos was formed around the base of the old Empire of Wesnoth. Weldyn was the old capital, established in the midlands, adyacent to abundant water streams coming from the north, and surrounded by hills. If the lands have flourished once again, that would be the best place to establish a new empire.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Excelent theory, but I would not bet on it. If the Emperor is not in the lands of the ancient Weldyn, we might get there just to be trapped with no exit.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "It is a risk we'll have to run, unfortunately.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Let's move, then.")}
+    [/event]

+    [/event]

+        )}

+    [/event]

+    # Spotted wose corpse
+    [event]
+        {SIGHTED_SUF_BY_PLAYER (
+        side=4
+        [wml_filter]
+            variation=wose
+        [/wml_filter]
+        )}
+        {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "Something really wrong goes on in here. There are undead tree-folk wandering around these plains.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "They are part of the innocent victims of the events of that fateful night, who were cursed by the demon lord to stay in the earth for the rest of eternity, trapped between death and life.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Then let's help and give them a final rest.")}
+    [/event]
+
+    # Spotted drake corpse
+    [event]
+        {SIGHTED_SUF_BY_PLAYER (
+        side=4
+        [wml_filter]
+            variation=drake
+        [/wml_filter]
+        )}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Is that the corpse of a dragon?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Yes and no. There once was a race, descendant of the legendary dragons, called the 'Drakes'. They quite resembled small dragons, and most of them could fly and breath fire as well, but they were smaller and different in various other ways.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "'They were'..., so is their race extinct?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "I don't know, but it's unlikely that they survived the chaos of the Fall.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "I would not think so. They had proven numerous times to be able to adapt to new environments and situations. I bet they went to safer corners of our world instead of perishing. If they survived the Fall, then it's very likely that their race has thrived ever since, due to the new cycle of day and night.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Erathan ( _ "Small groups of them flying over the seas have been spotted in many oportunities, actually.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "That confirms it. It is a shame that we have no means to communicate with them, as they have always preferred to isolate themselves from the other major races of this continent. Majestic creatures indeed, but not friendly except in rare ocassions.")}
+    [/event]
+
+    [event]
+        name=moveto
+        [filter]
+            side=1
+            [filter_location]
+                [filter_adjacent_location]
+                    terrain=Qxv # wmllint: ignore
+                [/filter_adjacent_location]
+            [/filter_location]
+        [/filter]
+        {MSG_SPEAKER unit ( _ "This chasm seems not to have a bottom, for I cannot see but a dense darkness on it. And a current of hot air comes from it.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "The same night we fought Yanqui, the earth opened and engulfed many with its infernal flames. I thought these chasms would be closed after all the time that has passed, but I suppose now that more time should pass before this place comes back to normal.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "So that explains why this place is very warm albeit the lack of sunlight.")}
+    [/event]
+[/scenario]

+#textdomain wesnoth-Invasion_from_the_Unknown
+[scenario]
+    id=22C_The_Backyard
+    name= _ "The Backyard"
+    {MAP 22C_The_Backyard.map}
+    turns=-1
+    next_scenario=23B_Welcome_to_the_Lair
+    victory_when_enemies_defeated=no
+
+    {EX_SCENARIO_MUSIC_PLAYLIST (
+        {EX_MUSIC        "knalgan_theme.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "nunc_dimittis.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "the_king_is_dead.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "the_city_falls.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "revelation.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "knolls.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "wanderer.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "loyalists.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "underground.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "main_menu.ogg"}
+        {EX_MUSIC_APPEND "main_menu_new.ogg"}
+    )}
+
+    {INDOORS_HIVE}
+
+    # Time schedule for the Shadow Master's Lair is "deep underground"
+    [time_area]
+        {DEEP_UNDERGROUND}
+        x=1-80
+        y=110-145
+    [/time_area]
+
+    {DEATHS_END}
+    {GLAMOUR_INIT_STUB}
+
+    {STORYTXT_THE_BACKYARD}
+    {STORYMAP_THE_BACKYARD}
+
+    # wmllint: recognize Mal Keshar
+    # wmllint: recognize Elynia
+    # wmllint: recognize Galas
+
+#define __INTERIM_ENEMY_AI
+    [ai]
+        caution=0.10
+        aggression=1.0
+        grouping=no
+        [target]
+            description=Elynia
+            value=10
+        [/target]
+        [target]
+            description=Mal Keshar
+            value=6
+        [/target]
+        [target]
+            description=Galas
+            value=8
+        [/target]
+    [/ai]
+#enddef
+
+    [side]
+        type=Elvish Hero
+        description=Galas
+        user_description= _ "Galas"
+        unrenamable=yes
+        side=1
+        canrecruit=yes
+        controller=human
+        team_name=good
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Galas"
+        shroud=yes
+        income=-2
+        village_gold=0
+    [/side]
+
+    # Ilzeth
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=2
+        colour=blue
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+
+    [/side]
+
+    # Biomechanical drones - dark hive
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=3
+        colour=purple
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Dark Hive"
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Arena drones and other supporters
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=4
+        colour=blue
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Elyssa
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=5
+        colour=green
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Lair biomechanical guards
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=6
+        colour=blue
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Lair guards"
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Lair chaos guards
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=7
+        colour=orange
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        team_name=evil
+        user_team_name= _ "team_name^Loyalists"
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Parts of the matrix
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=8
+        colour=black
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Doors and other NPCs
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=9
+        colour=black
+        controller=null
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+
+        village_gold=0
+        income=-2
+    [/side]
+
+    # Wandering Wyrms controller
+    [side]
+        no_leader=yes
+        side=10
+        colour=black
+        {CHAOS_FLAG}
+        controller=ai
+
+        {IS_HOSTILE_NPC}
+        team_name=evil
+        {HIDDEN_TEAM}
+    [/side]
+
+    {SETUP_SHAXTHAL_ROAMING_SOUND_EFFECTS}
+
+    [event]
+        name=prestart
+        {VARIABLE union yes}
+        {VARIABLE union_waiting_for_adjacents no}
+        {VARIABLE warlord_waiting_for_spawn no}
+        {VARIABLE warlord_can_be_killed no}
+        # wmllint: recognize Igor
+        # wmllint: recognize Erathan
+        # Recall heroes
+        {RECALL Elynia}
+        {RECALL (Mal Keshar)}
+        {RECALL Erathan}
+        {RECALL Lédinor}
+        {RECALL Igor}
+        {GAUNTLET_RECALL_METALIST}
+        [objectives]
+            side=1
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_WIN ( _ "Explore and find your way to the main Keep with Galas, Elynia, Mal Keshar or Erathan")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Galas")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Elynia")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Mal Keshar")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Lédinor")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_TO_LOSE ( _ "Death of Erathan")}
+            {OBJECTIVE_NOTES {ENEMY_RESPAWNING_WARNING} }
+        [/objectives]
+    [/event]
+
+    # Victory code
+    [event]
+        name=victory
+        {GAUNTLET_SAVE_RECALL_METALIST}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE union}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE union_waiting_for_adjacents}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE warlord_can_be_killed}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE warlord_waiting_for_spawn}
+    [/event]
+[/scenario]

+            [filter]
+                side=1
+                x=1-40
+                y=1-52
+            [/filter]
+            kill=yes
+            variable=recall_list_append_store
+        [/store_unit]
+        {FOREACH recall_list_append_store i}
+            {VARIABLE recall_list_append_store[$i].x ("recall")}
+            {VARIABLE recall_list_append_store[$i].y ("recall")}
+            {VARIABLE recall_list_append_store[$i].attacks_left 1}
+            [unstore_unit]
+                variable=recall_list_append_store[$i]
+            [/unstore_unit]
+        {NEXT i}
+        {CLEAR_VARIABLE recall_list_append_store}
+

+        {FADE_TO_BLACK}

+#define __SLF_INFO_MSG _MSG
+        {MSG_GLYPH ({_MSG})}
+        [+message]
+            caption= _ "Shaxthal lifeforms"
+        [/message]
+#enddef
+
+        {__SLF_INFO_MSG ( _ "The earliest modern Shaxthal design is basically a mundane creature covered in armor, though mangled, rid of its limbs and tail, when applicable. An onboard computer is embedded into its brain and controls it with the help of a neurointerface. However, this model was deprecated due to its high maintenance and development costs.")}
+        {__SLF_INFO_MSG ( _ "Instead, a basic genetic template for modifying, or even creating, living creatures to use them as the biological basis of Shaxthal lifeforms was designed. It involves fixating metallic elements into several proteins used to develop an exoskeleton during the larvary stage of their life cycles.")}
+        {__SLF_INFO_MSG ( _ "This new design allows for easy reproduction and control of the creatures. Their nerve system is genetically modified t be partially and remotely controlled when necessary, but the hard-coded instincts in their DNA are intended to serve most general purposes automatically, without need of direct intervention on the creatures.")}
+        {__SLF_INFO_MSG ( _ "Shaxthal lifeforms are raised in specially built reticuli where they get all the necessary support for their development. The creatures' adaptability should allow them to build new reticuli in new environments as well. Moreover, they can modify the genetics of foreign lifeforms and generate new shaxthal development trees. This has been reported to be successful in underground or underwater environments, rather than surface level.")}
+        {__SLF_INFO_MSG ( _ "Their exoskeleton is mostly composed of a modified keratin - protein - with light metallic elements fixated in strings. The result is a highly resistant, yet very flexible armor, which is even more versatile thanks to the arthropoda-inspired overall structure.")}
+#undef __SLF_INFO
+    [/event]
 [/scenario]

+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "There is, however, a place I would like to visit now - the island Althurin spoke us of, Zocthanol.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "What for?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "Since the Heart was destroyed and buried deep into the ground, I cannot investigate it to determine the nature and origin of those creatures relatives to Yechnagoth. However, there is still that island left, where the Quenoth elves established home upon. I want to either examine the place or get further information from the Tanuil's lore keepers.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Sounds like a fair plan. But, how are we going to make it there?")}
+        {MSG_UNIT (Mal Keshar) ( _ "Uh, sailing, I guess. Surely our northern friends won't mind if we borrow a ship or two from them and head to the open ocean.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Elynia ( _ "That is exactly what I had in mind, Malin.")}
+        {MSG_UNIT Galas ( _ "Let's travel back to the northern lands then. I want to visit our people as well...")}
+
+        {MSG_NARRATOR ( _ "And so, the group started a new journey; not for war, but for knowledge. The journey after the storm.")}
+        [kill]
+        [/kill]
+        {FADE_TO_BLACK}
         {ENDLEVEL_QUIET}
     [/event]
 [/scenario]

 # Impassable cave terrain - just an imitation of Uu (cave) with the cave wall movement properties
 {TERRAIN_BASE Xz cave/floor6}
 
+#define EX_TERRAIN_ADJACENT_CORNER_BOTH INNER OUTER IMAGESTEM
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_CORNER  {INNER} {OUTER} {OUTER} 52,76 {IMAGESTEM}-convex}
+    [+terrain_graphics]
+        precedence=1000
+    [/terrain_graphics]
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_CORNER  {OUTER} {INNER} {INNER} 56,68 {IMAGESTEM}-concave}
+    [+terrain_graphics]
+        precedence=1000
+    [/terrain_graphics]
+#enddef

+#define DISABLE_TRANSITIONS_PREC _TERRAIN_PATTERN
+    {DISABLE_TRANSITIONS {_TERRAIN_PATTERN} }
+    {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
+#enddef
+
 #define TERRAIN_BASE_PREC _TERRAIN_PATTERN _IMAGESTEM
     {TERRAIN_BASE {_TERRAIN_PATTERN} {_IMAGESTEM} }
     {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
@@ -20,7 +25,20 @@
     {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
 #enddef
 
+# TERRAIN_ADJACENT_PREC used to be a simple call to
+#!  {TERRAIN_ADJACENT {_LAYER} {_TERRAIN_PATTERN} {_ADJACENT} {_IMAGESTEM} }
+#!  {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
+# However, I didn't know back then that TERRAIN_ADJACENT expands to 4 [terrain_graphics] nodes,
+# of which {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE} could only override the last one; 1-tile transitions.
+# Thus I expand TERRAIN_ADJACENT manually to append the override to each [terrain_graphics] node
+# properly.
 #define TERRAIN_ADJACENT_PREC _LAYER _TERRAIN_PATTERN _ADJACENT _IMAGESTEM
-    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT {_LAYER} {_TERRAIN_PATTERN} {_ADJACENT} {_IMAGESTEM} }
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_4_FL ({_LAYER}) ({_TERRAIN_PATTERN}) ({_ADJACENT}) {_IMAGESTEM} transition}
     {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_3_FL ({_LAYER}) ({_TERRAIN_PATTERN}) ({_ADJACENT}) {_IMAGESTEM} transition}
+    {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_2_FL ({_LAYER}) ({_TERRAIN_PATTERN}) ({_ADJACENT}) {_IMAGESTEM} transition}
+    {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
+    {TERRAIN_ADJACENT_1_FL ({_LAYER}) ({_TERRAIN_PATTERN}) ({_ADJACENT}) {_IMAGESTEM} transition}
+    {SET_DEFAULT_PRECEDENCE}
 #enddef

     unit_description= _ "Finally moving on from the dirk and dagger to the sword, the Greatbow is superior to the Strongbow in melee combat, but not as powerful as the Slayer. Their bow, however, is a masterpiece of military design. Several months are spent crafting a single bow, and each bow is crafted by the user, to his individual specifications. Due to the incredible strength required to pull these bows, anyone but the crafter who attempts to draw it could suffer serious injury."

They can confuse their oponents by standing in fron of them, seemingly defenseless; after the attacker hits, they notice their victim is behind them, ready to perform her own killing strike. On the battlefield these sorceresses are fearsome enemies; even their comrades keep an eye on them, carefully, from a safe distance. And so it happens that even the Royal orders of Wesnothian magi treat these noble lores with respect and caution."+{SPECIAL_NOTES}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_MAGICAL}

+    description= _ "During most of the Golden Age, the humans who inhabited the Great Continent were mostly Wesnothians, divided across various territories such as the Northlands, Elensefar and the kingdom of Wesnoth itself. However, there was once a time of great strife during which a new race of humans started to appear from nowhere. They were the 'Aragwaithi', which meant 'noble' in their native language.
 
 It has been since then rumored that they came from the Vast Sea to settle in Wesnoth. They mostly lived as mercenaries in that time, until the Fall. After that, they supposedly moved to the northmost lands of the Continent, were the sands could not reach, and the green could survive.
 
-Albeit being humans, many of their customs and racial features are incredibly different to the standards, in such a manner that puts them close to elves in terms of their dexterity with bows. Their wisemen have a mastery of magic not to be underestimated in the battlefield, for it has surprised and overseded the best magi often."

+    unit_description= _ "Of all the horrors that have been witnessed by all those who oppose the Chaos Empire and survive the time necessary to pass the story onto generation by generation, the worst ever recorded might be these floating metallic beasts that resemble nagas in shape, and insects in appearance, that have big and strong claws, capable of cutting a man in half with small, if not nought, effort. These abominations, called the 'Shaxthal' by the witnesses, honor their name, derived from an ancient human dialect - which would mean 'invincible' in the modern tongue -, by being fierce, seemingly unstoppable and virtually invulnerable to physical weapons, for their body is protected by an incredibly tough and thick shell-armor, of which the only flaw would be the gaps of flesh in each joint, smelling like rotten flesh.
 
 By their resemblance to insects, they have also been titled the 'Drones' by the rebel forces, but it is a name easily underestimated by unexperienced fighters that have never seen them in reality. Those foolish ones only survive long enough to be crushed alive, limb by limb, by a lightbeam coming from the creature's eyes."+{SPECIAL_NOTES}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_POISON}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_SUBMERGE}
     die_sound={SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_DIE}

===================================================================
--- branches/1.4/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/units/shaxthal/Larva.cfg	2008-05-01 13:51:08 UTC (rev 2189)
+++ branches/1.4/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/units/shaxthal/Larva.cfg	2008-05-01 13:55:26 UTC (rev 2190)
@@ -0,0 +1,244 @@
+#textdomain wesnoth-Invasion_from_the_Unknown
+
+[unit]
+    id=Shaxthal Larva
+    name= _ "Larva"
+    race=shaxthal
+    image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+    {SHAXTHAL_ONRECRUIT_CHECK_SURFACE_FLAG "Shaxthal Larva"}
+    ellipse="misc/ellipse-nozoc"
+    {MAGENTA_IS_THE_TEAM_COLOR}
+    hitpoints=16
+    movement_type=biomechanical_drone
+    movement=4
+    experience=30
+    level=0
+    alignment=neutral
+    advanceto=Shaxthal Drone,Shaxthal Runner Drone
+    cost=8
+    usage=fighter
+    [resistance]
+        blade=120
+        pierce=130
+        impact=110
+        fire=140
+        cold=130
+    [/resistance]
+    unit_description= _ "Every creature must undergo a larvary state in their lifecycle, and shaxthals are not an exception to the rule. They are weak and dumb, and their body is still soft, barely armored. Although not suited for direct combat, shaxthal larvas can still be dangerous to unwary adversaries thanks to their poisonous salive and blood."+{SPECIAL_NOTES}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_POISON}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_SUBMERGE}
+    die_sound={SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_DIE}
+    {DEFENSE_ANIM "units/shaxthal/larva.png" "units/shaxthal/larva.png" {SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_HIT} }
+    [abilities]
+        {ABILITY_SUBMERGE}
+    [/abilities]
+    [attack]
+        name=fangs
+        #textdomain wesnoth-units
+        description= _ "fangs"
+        type=pierce
+        range=melee
+        damage=5
+        number=2
+        [specials]
+            {WEAPON_SPECIAL_POISON}
+        [/specials]
+    [/attack]
+    [attack]
+        name=tentacle
+        description= _ "tentacle"
+        type=impact
+        range=melee
+        damage=2
+        number=8
+        [specials]
+            {WEAPON_SPECIAL_SWARM}
+        [/specials]
+    [/attack]
+    [attack_anim]
+        [attack_filter]
+            name=tentacle
+        [/attack_filter]
+        [frame]
+            begin=-200
+            end=-150
+            image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+        [/frame]
+        [if]
+            hits=yes
+            [frame]
+                begin=-150
+                end=50
+                image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+                sound=squishy-strike.wav
+            [/frame]
+        [/if]
+        [else]
+            hits=no
+            [frame]
+                begin=-150
+                end=50
+                image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+                sound=squishy-miss.wav
+            [/frame]
+        [/else]
+        [frame]
+            begin=50
+            end=100
+            image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+        [/frame]
+    [/attack_anim]
+    [attack_anim]
+        [attack_filter]
+            name=fangs
+        [/attack_filter]
+        [if]
+            hits=yes
+            [frame]
+                begin=-150
+                end=-50
+                image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+                sound=bite.ogg
+            [/frame]
+        [/if]
+        [else]
+            hits=no
+            [frame]
+                begin=-150
+                end=-50
+                image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+                sound={SOUND_LIST:MISS}
+            [/frame]
+        [/else]
+        [frame]
+            begin=-50
+            end=100
+            image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+        [/frame]
+        {SOUND:POISON}
+        [frame]
+            begin=100
+            end=200
+            image="units/shaxthal/larva.png"
+        [/frame]
+    [/attack_anim]
+    [variation]
+        variation_name=surface
+        id=Shaxthal Larva
+        name= _ "Larva"
+        race=shaxthal
+        image="units/shaxthal/larva+surface.png"
+        ellipse="misc/ellipse-nozoc"
+        {MAGENTA_IS_THE_TEAM_COLOR}
+        hitpoints=16
+        movement_type=biomechanical_drone
+        movement=4
+        experience=30
+        level=0
+        alignment=neutral
+        advanceto=Shaxthal Drone,Shaxthal Runner Drone
+        cost=8
+        usage=fighter
+        [resistance]
+            blade=120
+            pierce=130
+            impact=110
+            fire=140
+            cold=130
+        [/resistance]
+        unit_description= _ "Every creature must undergo a larvary state in their lifecycle, and shaxthals are not an exception to the rule. They are weak and dumb, and their body is still soft, barely armored. Although not suited for direct combat, shaxthal larvas can still be dangerous to unwary adversaries thanks to their poisonous salive and blood."+{SPECIAL_NOTES}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_POISON}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_SUBMERGE}
+        die_sound={SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_DIE}
+        {DEFENSE_ANIM "units/shaxthal/larva+surface.png" "units/shaxthal/larva+surface.png" {SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_HIT} }
+        [abilities]
+            {ABILITY_SUBMERGE}
+        [/abilities]
+        [attack]
+            name=fangs
+            #textdomain wesnoth-units
+            description= _ "fangs"

+            range=melee
+            damage=5
+            number=2
+            [specials]
+                {WEAPON_SPECIAL_POISON}
+            [/specials]
+        [/attack]

+            name=tentacle

+            range=melee

+            [/attack_filter]
+            [frame]
+                begin=-200
+                end=-150
+                image="units/shaxthal/larva+surface.png"
+            [/frame]

+                hits=yes

+++ branches/1.4/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/Invasion_from_the_Unknown/units/shaxthal/Rayblade.cfg	2008-05-01 13:55:26 UTC (rev 2190)
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+#textdomain wesnoth-Invasion_from_the_Unknown
+# Sprites found under Neoriceisgood's art gallery at www.wesnoth.org
+
+[unit]
+    id=Shaxthal Rayblade
+    name= _ "Rayblade"
+    race=shaxthal
+    image="units/shaxthal/rayblade.png"
+    {MAGENTA_IS_THE_TEAM_COLOR}
+    hitpoints=44
+    movement_type=biomechanical_elusivefoot
+    movement=5
+    experience=150
+    level=2
+    alignment=neutral
+    advanceto=null
+    {AMLA_DEFAULT}
+    cost=32
+    usage=fighter
+    unit_description= _ "Very few have survived the 'bladestorm' that the Rayblades perform in the battlefield. In an unnatural manner, they can spin over their own bodies and destroy their oponents by extending their arms, which instead of hands at the end have sharp blades, during a fast spinning. Yet worse is that they seem not to require air at all, being able to stay hours, or days, perhaps, in the waters of the deepest rivers known."+{SPECIAL_NOTES}+{SPECIAL_NOTES_SUBMERGE}
+    die_sound={SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_DIE}
+    {DEFENSE_ANIM "units/shaxthal/rayblade.png" "units/shaxthal/rayblade.png" {SOUND_LIST:BIOMECHANICAL_HIT} }
+    [abilities]
+        {ABILITY_SUBMERGE}
+    [/abilities]
+    [attack]
+        name=rayblade
+        description= _ "weapon_i18n_name^rayblade"
+        type=blade
+        range=melee
+        damage=6
+        number=6
+    [/attack]
+    [attack_anim]
+        [attack_filter]
+            name=blade
+        [/attack_filter]
+        start_time=-200
+        [frame]
+            duration=50
+            image="units/shaxthal/rayblade.png"
+        [/frame]
+        [if]
+            hits=yes
+            [frame]
+                duration=200
+                image="units/shaxthal/rayblade.png"
+                sound={SOUND_LIST:SWORD_SWISH}
+            [/frame]
+        [/if]
+        [else]
+            hits=no
+            [frame]
+                duration=200
+                image="units/shaxthal/rayblade.png"
+                sound={SOUND_LIST:MISS}
+            [/frame]
+        [/else]
+        [frame]
+            duration=50
+            image="units/shaxthal/rayblade.png"
+        [/frame]
+    [/attack_anim]
+[/unit]
